data.text: @CarolynKate67 Hi Carolyn, I'm sorry that you have to pay additional for your checked baggage. Would you mind sending us a DM and see what we can do? Thanks - Vi

@hollyelli Hi Holly, we appreciate your feedback. Please be assured that we have escalated your concerns to the relevant team. If you would like to provide any additional feedback, feel free to DM us with your booking details. Thanks – Vi

@hollyelli Hi Holly, thanks for reaching out. The use of masks is mandatory on all flights and in all airports across Australia, except where a medical exemption exist. We ensure that all our team members are adhering to the correct requirements at all times. Thanks – Dan
@Mukurukuswinya Hi there, sorry to hear that you haven't received your status points. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Leslie
@AUhasFallen Hi @AUhasFallen, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info?. Thanks - Jeff

@profmaxchillin Hi there, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient it can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jaya
@cnewman89_ Hey Chris, there’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great flight experience. Thanks for letting us know! - Leslie
@nicwkelly Pretty indeed! Thanks for sharing this amazing photo, Nic! ❤ - Jaya

@isabelrivascl That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, Isabel. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further? Thanks - Jaya
@Chrisquirk Hi Chris. I'm sorry to hear about what happened with your booking. We’d love the chance to check this and see what we can do. Could you please send us a DM? Thanks - Chichi

@MMantscheffAu Thanks for letting us know, Marcus. I understand how upsetting it can be. Our staff do their best to get everyone onboard safely and smoothly. We’ll share this feedback with the team. – Jay
@heathermedowie Hi Heather. I'm sorry to hear about your experience. If you need further assistance with your booking, kindly send us a DM. Thanks – Chichi
@RosanneFaigao Hi Rosanne. I'm sorry to hear about what happened with your booking. We’d love the chance to check this and see what we can do. Could you please send us a DM? Thanks - Chichi

@AFRahman Hi AF, I'm sorry to hear about your recent experience. While delays are hard to plan for, you can be certain that our team are working hard to get you up in the air ASAP. You may send us a DM if you require assistance with a specific booking. Thanks - Jay
@RobKiddAU Love these photos, Rob! Enjoy the launch :) - Chichi
@RosieWaterland Hey Rosie, we didn't receive your DM - do you mind trying again please? We'd like to see what we can do to get this sorted for you! Thanks - Jay

@jcjobau Hi James, that’s the kind of feedback we love to hear. We’re so glad Zyra was on-hand to help make your experience with us a great one. We’ll definitely pass on the feedback (I’m sure it’ll make her day!) Cheers - Norine
@PipBondi Hi Pip, I understand that this is important to you. Would you mind sending us a DM with more details? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jay

@verifiedstory Hi Tony, sorry to hear that your flight was changed. I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please DM us, we'd be happy to check this now. Thanks – Dan
@RosieWaterland Hi @RosieWaterland, thanks for reaching out. We'd like to look into this for you, can you send us a Direct Message.- Dan
@martincorben Hi Martin, thanks for reaching out. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this. Thanks – Leslie
@tim_katiba Hi Tim, you may check in through Manage Booking here: https://t.co/IEr6u9wlPH. For further assistance, feel free to send us a DM so we can assist you. Thanks - Bree
@Jmac2379 Hi John, thanks for your feedback. Feel free to send us a DM if you require booking assistance. Thanks - Leslie
@DomFlanaganC300 Hi Dominic. Sorry to hear that you did not receive a response, would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Dan
@carstendog Hi @carstendog, sorry to hear that. We’d love the chance to chat with you and assist with your query. Could you please send us a DM? – Leslie

urls.title: Travel Alerts | Jetstar
urls.description: Chat with one of our friendly Jetstar customer service

data.text: @IsraelSegall HI Israel, I appreciate you've already booked tickets from Melbourne to Tasmania. Please visit our Travel Alerts page for more updates regarding travel restrictions: https://t.co/XzmsPFAFDY. Thanks - Bree
@katyjanev_ Hi Katy, thanks for reaching out. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can assist? Thanks - Leslie

@kamalbora94 Hi Kamal, we’ll need passengers to comply with any relevant government or other travel requirements. We highly recommend to check the latest government travel requirements for your origin and destination. You can check more details here - https://t.co/mlwAdKi3fV. Thanks -Kauri

@AdamHalen Hi Adam, I understand that you're still upset with the charges for your carry-on. If you go over the carry-on weight limit, fees would apply. If you need further assistance, you may send us a DM with your booking number and full name. Thanks – Kauri

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

urls.title: Travel identification: domestic Australia and NZ flights | Jetstar
urls.description: Your guide to travel identification requirements when travelling with Jetstar on domestic flights within Australia and New Zealand.

data.text: @jahinzee Hi Jahin, thanks for your tweet. Expired Passports/IDs will not be accepted at the check in counter. For more information, check this link out: https://t.co/BYdU4APknR. Thanks - Vi
@Fran_dvy Hi Fran, I'm sorry to hear about your friend's voucher. Please advise her to send us a DM so we can look into this further. Thanks - Vi

@AdamHalen Hi Adam, I appreciate you're unhappy with the charges for upgrading your carry-on baggage allowance. It usually costs higher when you add baggage to an existing one. You may also check here for more info about baggage: https://t.co/eynNRXfa7S. Thanks - Bree

@JacquesRizzi Hey Jacques, there’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great flight experience. Thanks for letting us know! We’ll definitely pass this on to the team! Cheers - Bree

@darrenw_au Hi Darren, sorry to hear you're having trouble with our website. I can see that it's currently working.  It may help if you clear the cache and cookies saved in your browser. You may DM us if you need further assistance on a booking. Thanks – Bree

@eliseharper_ Hi Elise, sorry to hear you’re also having trouble with our website. Please try to clear the cache and cookies saved in your browser. You may also DM us if you need further assistance on a booking. Thanks – Bree

@s_bartlett16 Hi Sally, I appreciate you're having trouble printing your mobile boarding pass. If it's still not working online, please be at the check-in counters during opening times, so you can print your boarding pass through one of our kiosks. Thanks - Bree

@sambowoods Hi Sam, sorry to hear that you're having a problem accessing our website. I would recommend clearing your cookies and cache. If still doesn't work, you can try using a different browser or device. Thanks - Kauri

@a_sridharan Hi Ara, thanks for reaching out. Sorry to hear you’re having trouble accessing our website. It may help if you clear the cache and cookies saved in your browser. You may DM us if you need further assistance on a booking. Thanks – Jay

@missamr Hi @missamr, I appreciate how upsetting it can be to have to pay for an excess baggage fee at the airport. We limit carry on to 7kgs in total for each passenger. If you think you might need a little more next time, you can purchase an extra 7kgs online before flying. Thanks – Jen

@AkkaraAntony That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, Antony. Sorry to hear that you haven't received  your refund yet, would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further? Thanks - Dan
@EternalBrown That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, @EternalBrown. We're looking forward to seeing you onboard soon! ✈️ Thanks - Leslie
@SamDavison42 Hi Sam, sorry to hear about your experience. We'd like to look into this further. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? Thanks - Jen
@Cocoisgib Hi Coco. Yes, you can check in multiple bags as long as the total weight of your items is not more than 30kg. -Jen
@letitiarose_ Hi Letitia, I know a cancelled flight is a huge inconvenience. I'm really sorry it's impacted your travel plans. If you require further assistance, you can send us a DM. Thanks -Kauri

@TheMuellerName Hi Ross, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. We do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. Feel free to DM us so we can discuss your options and assist. Thanks - Vi
@Sanchit25jogie Hey Sanchit, we have responded to your DM. Thanks - Chichi
@jlask Hi Jlask. That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have. We'd like to check this further for you and we have also responded to your DM. Thanks - Jen

data.text: @Sanchit25jogie Hi Sanchit.  Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into your bookings further. Please also delete your tweet as it contains personal information. We ask passengers not to comment this information publicly. Thanks – Chichi
@fiedag Hi there, that doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have. Would you mind sending us a DM here so we can look into it further?  Thanks - Norine
@thejackdiary Hi Jack, would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this for you. Thanks – Jen
@Skip2Beat Hi there, sorry to hear you were unable to reach us. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jaya
@BaggerMetrics Hi  Bagger, let’s try to sort things out for you now. Could you please PM us, so we can look into your flight options? Thanks – Jen

data.text: @BaggerMetrics Hi there, thanks for reaching out. Sorry to hear that you're unable to find information about isolation. You will need to check the latest travel requirements and information with the relevant government authority prior to travelling. Thanks - Leslie
@hurvitz_greg Hi Greg, sorry to hear about that. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into your flight status again. Thanks – Jen
@GompertzKatie Hi Katie, I'm sorry to hear about this. Would you mind sending us a DM and provide your booking number? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Kauri

domain.name: Music Genre

data.text: @IroNikki Wow! Happy to hear that you met BTS, Nikki. Thanks for sharing this. We’ll definitely pass this on to our team, they’ll be stoked to hear it. - Jaya

@davmoro Hi David, I understand it is upsetting to have a delayed flight. We do our best to avoid delays but sometimes things are out of our hands. Let’s try to sort things out for you now. Could you please send us a DM so we can look into things for you? Thanks - Norine

@RajeshPurushot7 Hi Rj, I understand you’re upset. Carry-on is separate from checked baggage allowance - which means there are still excess baggage fees if you go over the carry-on weight limit before you board your flight. Feel free to send us a DM if you require further assistance. – Leslie
@GuidoTresoldi ✈️👏 C’mon Victory (who said that? 🤷🏻♀️). Have fun Guido! - Vi
@Keirashley Hey Keira, what an amazing view! Thanks for your video and we hope you had a fantastic flight. - Jaya
@vincehellier That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, @vincehellier. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further? Thanks - Jeff

@SirJoe1972 Hi Sergio, thanks for reaching out. We don't have the list of our checked baggage allowance prices online. You can check them by adding the baggage to your booking here https://t.co/cgk7E4gzOl. Thanks - Jen
@jmpouliot Thanks for letting us know Jean-Michel. We are looking into this with the team at the moment - I would recommend clearing your cookies and cache then check it again. Thanks - Paul
@JaneBro03799353 That’s definitely not the experience we’d want for customers like yourself, Jane. Thanks for letting us know. We'll be sure to pass your feedback on for improvement. Thanks - Jen
@Drcoma_aus Hey DrComa, there’s nothing we like more than hearing that our passengers has had a great flight experience. Thanks for letting us know! We’ll definitely pass this on. Thanks - Chichi

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @simonfrary Hey Simon, thanks for your tweet. Glad to hear that you had booked a great deal. Looking forward to welcome you onboard soon! Cheers - Chichi
@R1CHARDFREEDMAN Hi Richard. I'm sorry to hear about your recent experience with your baggage. Are you able to please DM us with your details so we can look into this further? Thanks – Vi
@SimoneDejun Sorry to hear you missed out this time, Simone. Don’t worry though, we’re sure there will be another sale you can take advantage of soon.  Thanks – Kauri

@DallasSmith666 Hi Dallas, sorry to hear you’re having trouble at the website. I tried it in my end and the 22nd December MCY-MEL flight at 8:40 am shows the fare for Club Jetstar members. It may help if you clear the cache and cookies saved in your browser. Thanks – Kauri
@mufc_retro Hi there, would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this. Thanks – Leslie

@NeilJamesMiller Hi Neil, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight - we know how inconvenient it can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’ll see what we can do to get you on your way to Auckland. - Jaya

urls.title: Contact us: Lost, damaged and delayed baggage | Jetstar
urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

data.text: @regentwanderer Hi @regentwanderer. Sorry to hear that you lost a property during the flight, our baggage team are best placed to assist with this. For more info and speak with them directly, visit https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. - Dan

@Kranster Hi there, thanks for reaching out. Sorry to hear that you can't use your voucher yet. I understand that you'd like to use it to book a flight to Broome, however, Jetstar credit vouchers can only be used to book flights on our website. Thanks - Leslie

data.text: @PipHaz Hi Pip, I understand it’s upsetting having to pay for excess baggage at the airport. All of our customers are given 7kg of carry-on baggage – including handbags and laptops. If your carry-on is over the weight limit, you’ll still have to pay an excess baggage fee. - Leslie

@sophieloupalmer Hi Sophie, sorry to see you’ve experienced a bit of a wait yesterday during check-in at Ballina. We’ve passed this back onto our Airport Management Team to ensure we can continue to improve the way we do things in the future and hope you enjoyed your flight! Thanks -Kauri

@ellendavismee Hey Ellen, there’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great flight experience. Thanks for letting us know! Looking forward for you to fly with us again soon. Cheers! - Kauri
@Diana0731 Hi Diana, yes it is still part of the Fly Flexible campaign. You can actually see it just below the flight schedule on the same page you're at. Thanks - Bree

@davmoro Hey David, I understand how difficult this is and sorry for any inconvenience. We do our best to avoid making changes unless it’s absolutely necessary. Whatever the reason, we make sure we have options for you. Don't hesitate to send a DM for further assistance. Thanks - Norine

@davmoro Hi David, I know how upsetting it is when flights get changed. If you have a current booking affected by this, please feel free to send us a DM so we can look into the options for you. Thanks - Bree

@e2_6051 Hi there, great to hear you're applying for a cabin crew position. I can best suggest to wait for updates, or feel free to visit our careers page here:  https://t.co/Wf8KPbPwSF. Thanks - Bree

@ChattyinOz Hi Sharene, I understand how upsetting it can be to have a cancelled flights. Would you mind sending us a DM here with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine
@Jasace79 Hi JPG, I appreciate this must be frustrating for you. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine

@karlihadden Hi Karlihadden, we know how inconvenient delayed flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info so we can look into this? Thanks – Jay

@BrianHulkLe Hi Brian, sorry to hear that you're unable to find information about your flight. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking details? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this. Thanks – Leslie

@adamtaylo Hi Adam, I understand the frustration. Carry-on allowance is separate from your checked baggage allowance, there are still fees if you go over the carry-on weight limit. It’s less about making profit and more about being able to keep the cost of our airfares down. Thanks - Norine
@DallasSmith666 Hi Dallas, I'm sorry to hear that your're having difficulties to book. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jay
@DallasSmith666 Hi Dallas, sorry to hear about that. Please send us a DM so we can check this further. Thanks -Jen

@DallasSmith666 Hi Dallas, thanks for reaching out. Not all flights on all days are on sale, if there aren’t any sale left on the dates that you are searching, you could check the sale page for a different route or date and try again. Hope that helps. – Dan
@darrenw_au Hi Darren, sorry to hear about your experience. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see how we can help. Can you send us a DM so we can assist? Thanks – Kauri
@mswanderpat Hi Patricia, I understand how important this is to you. Once we already have flights to that destination we will update our website as soon as possible. Thanks - Jen

data.text: @regentwanderer Hey there. You may bring the bottle of gin as part of your carry on. Please be reminded that Alcohol should not be over 70% and must be securely sealed in retail packaging. You are also not allowed to consume it onboard. Thanks - Chichi

urls.title: Sales and special deals | Jetstar
urls.description: Rather be on holiday? Check out Jetstar’s latest sales, deals and exclusive offers. Find domestic and international flights at the lowest price guaranteed, backed by our Price Beat Guarantee. Conditions apply.

data.text: @mswanderpat Hi Patricia. I appreciate that you wish to travel on those days. However, flight availability depends on customer demand. No worries though, you may check the sale page for a different route or date instead here: https://t.co/xzwWX91vcV. Thanks -Kauri
@e2_6051 Hi there, that's great! Thanks for choosing Jetstar and see you on your next trip with us. - Vi

@paulalouise95 Hi Paula, sorry to hear that you're unable to book any flights on our website. We're working on it now. In the meantime, you can send us a DM providing the flight details so we can assist you with your booking. Thanks - Jaya

@georgiabower1 Hi Georgia, sorry for the inconvenience. We're working on it now. In the meantime, you can send us a DM providing the flight details so we can assist you with your booking. Thanks -Kauri
@Smedsta Hi Ryan, I'm sorry our system isn't making this easy for you. We’re looking into this now. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd be happy to assist you with your booking. Thanks - Leslie

@HarryGifford6 Hi Harry, sorry for the inconvenience. We’re having some problems with our site – but we’re working on it! Can you send us a DM providing the flight details so we can assist you with your booking? Thanks - Kauri
@Bones1709 Hi Neil, we’re having some problems with our site – but we’re working on it! Can you send us a DM providing the flight details so we can help you with your booking? Thanks - Kauri
@mswanderpat Hi Patricia, that’s no good. I'm sorry for the inconvenience. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can help you sort out your booking? - Jay

@plane_clapper Hi there, sorry to hear about your recent experience. We’re usually very proud of the customer service our team deliver, so we’d like to look into this further. If you could DM us, we can get that started. - Jaya
